name: keynote-tracker
description: A modern CLI tool to track latest announcements from major tech keynotes

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.js --compile --outfile dist/keynote-tracker && cp node_modules/yoga-wasm-web/dist/yoga.wasm dist/
scripts.build:macos: bun build ./src/index.js --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/keynote-tracker-macos && cp node_modules/yoga-wasm-web/dist/yoga.wasm dist/
scripts.build:linux: bun build ./src/index.js --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/keynote-tracker-linux && cp node_modules/yoga-wasm-web/dist/yoga.wasm dist/
scripts.build:windows: bun build ./src/index.js --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/keynote-tracker-windows.exe && cp node_modules/yoga-wasm-web/dist/yoga.wasm dist/
scripts.build:all: bun run build:macos && bun run build:linux && bun run build:windows
